hooks.after:bump: npx auto-changelog -p --commit-limit false --ignore-commit-pattern '^((dev|chore|ci):|Release)' && git add CHANGELOG.md
hooks.after:release:
echo '
✅ Release v${version} created as DRAFT

⚠️  ACTION REQUIRED: Edit release notes and publish at:
   https://github.com/wernerglinka/metalsmith-components/releases/tag/v${version}
'
